title: $:/plugins/tg/timestamp-button
author: TonGerner
name: Timestamp button
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_index.html">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_index.html"/> \define icn(icon) \end A button (<>) for the Editor toolbar that inserts a timestamp.
Adapt the date/time format - `<>` in $:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/timestamp - to your liking.
Assigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/timestamp}}
